mapper.select: select a.orderSeq, d.shName, d.shBrandCd, d.shSizeCd, d.shTypeCd, c.shOrderCount, a.regDateTime, b.memName, a.orderStatusCd FROM `order` AS a left join member AS b ON a.member_memSeq = b.memSeq left join order_detail AS c ON a.orderSeq = c.order_orderSeq left join shoes AS d ON c.shoes_shSeq = d.shSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.orderTypeCd =21
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET orderStatusCd = 27 WHERE orderSeq = #{orderSeq} AND orderStatusCd = 26
UPDATE shoes AS a JOIN order_detail AS b ON a.shSeq = b.shoes_shSeq SET a.shCount = a.shCount + b.shOrderCount WHERE 1=1 AND b.order_orderSeq = #{orderSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.orderSeq, d.shSeq, d.shName, d.shSizeCd, c.shOrderCount, a.orderStatusCd FROM `order` a LEFT JOIN order_detail c ON a.orderSeq = c.order_orderSeq LEFT JOIN shoes d ON c.shoes_shSeq = d.shSeq WHERE 1=1 AND orderStatusCd = 26 AND orderSeq=#{orderSeq}

select a.orderSeq, a.orderTypeCd, a.orderDelNy, c.memName, c.memId, c.memAddress, a.regDateTime, a.deliveryStatus, a.paymentStatus, a.orderStatusCd from `order` AS a left join member AS c ON a.member_memSeq= c.memSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.orderTypeCd = 20 AND a.orderStatusCd = 24
order By orderSeq DESC
